title: Suspects in NYC's Bizarre Crypto Torture Case Indicted on Serious Charges
description: The two suspects in NYC's crypto kidnapping and torture case just can't catch a break ... prosecutors just unsealed an indictment charging them with a series of felonies -- one day after their Kentucky home was raided by the feds. Bitcoin investors…
